name: df-dvr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdvr, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cui, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cinvr, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))

comment: Define ring division. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
